attributes.action: Apologise and pay reparations to the people of Tanzania for the unnecessary sale in 2001 of a £28 million military air traffic control system to one of the world's poorest countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a deal criticised by the World Bank, the British Government in 2001 approved the sale of a £28 million military air traffic control system to one of the world's poorest countries, a country without an air force! The people of Tanzania should be compensated by the British Government for this act.
